VinMemory — Full AI Index
This is the extended reference index for the VinMemory repository, optimized for AI consumption.
It lists all significant documents, deep links, and structured categories.

1. Prompts
prompts/README.md — Overview of prompt patterns.

prompts/system-prompts.md — Ready-to-use system prompts.

prompts/json-style.md — JSON output prompt patterns.

2. Guides
guides/README.md — Navigation hub for all guides.

guides/tool-X-setup.md — Setup steps for Tool X.

guides/workflow-automation.md — Automating AI-assisted workflows.

3. Cheatsheets
cheatsheets/README.md — Cheatsheet collection index.

cheatsheets/regex.md — Common regex patterns.

cheatsheets/shell.md — Shell command quick reference.

4. Assets
assets/ — Images, diagrams, and supplementary files.

5. GitMCP Connection Info
MCP SSE URL: https://gitmcp.io/vdeaugustine/VinMemory
